mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.role_id = rm.role_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND m.deleted = 0 AND m.status = 1 ORDER BY m.order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.role_id = rm.role_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND m.deleted = 0 AND m.status = 1 AND m.perms IS NOT NULL AND m.perms != ''
